title: Availability of battlefield view on Screen
body:
Why is it we must put up with access to abilities and have a portion of our vision blocked by a choice not taken [^}.

Would it not be easier for the button to be [V] and covering the bar graphs for [Energy] & [Mana]. I recon. that would save probs 3-5% total vision and would not cause  hit & miss situations to arise.  

@ 5%^ I am sure that my allround game would improve.  How about yours?  Couldn't be too harmful, foreshore!

replies.body: I've literally never been hindered by the hud, not sure how you are
Not so much hindered, I was just thinking that it might free up some space to work in
You can change the size of the HUD if you want some more on-screen vision

I will have a look at that next game yet I believe that the issue raised of "options to increase abilities,[^]" interfering in the field of play when they could quite easily be assigned to be appearing below the ability icons and intermittently covering the "Energy & Mana" <bar graphs>  where there is less chance of interference in play-making over by the south wall and scrub, sometimes even masking/hiding the interloper using abovementioned physical attibutes in the Abyss.
